sub_title: Creative and Producer for Digital Projects and Games
summary:
Producer, creative, game designer, writer, facilitator, and problem-solver with 7 years experience. 

Having run in entertainment, advertising and activist circles, I've gained a technical and creative mind, with a human-focused heart. I'm looking to use all the experience I've gained to make better work, to work better, and to better the world with others. 

Most recently I've been involved in the climate march of 40,000 people in the Netherlands and at Extinction Rebellion NL & Greenpeace as a facilitator and mobiliser.

- Creative direction, game design, narrative design and writing
- Design thinking and creative guidance
- Team management, client relations and project delivery
- Digital product development 
- Information visualization, transferable documentation and workflow optimization

Corporate collaborators: Google, LEGO, adidas, JEEP, Jumbo, Red Bull, Adult Swim and Turner Broadcasting

profile_positions.description:
As a game designer my focus was on: archiving game design in relation to current projects, as projects had varied undocumented history, and untangle the opportunities that existed to improve them, redesign specific elements of their games for future platforms, and do research for new projects proposed by management.

As a producer my role was primarily to support the team, by researching and setting up management software (Monday) for the whole team to use (this was adopted across all of Soedesco), setting up realistic timelines, managing feature backlogs for several projects within one of their major IP, as well as supporting and guiding other project owners in the creation and management of their own timelines and accompanying expectations.
───────────
profile_positions.title: Game Designer / Producer

profile_positions.description:
This hybrid role was to oversee, advise & implement the digital transition of their volunteer platform, as well as network, support & mobilise ecological farmers as a politically active base.
───────────
profile_positions.title: Community Mobiliser Biodiversity

profile_positions.description:
METSÄ GROUP Pro Nemus Innovation Center
- In collaboration with MKTG and Bright, we created 2 interactive installations to detail the workings of Metsä's revolutionary Bio-Mill as a touch-screen installation, as well as their co-op environmentally-friendly forest management as a projection-mapping installation. 
https://thefwa.com/cases/pro-nemus

Quest to LEGOLAND
- In collaboration with VML and LEGOLAND Florida we created an original app for android and iOS. In the app, kids follow a LEGO minifigure through an interactive adventure of landmarks, puzzles, games, quizzes, and trivia mapped in real-time as they travel to LEGOLAND Florida using GPS.
https://www.legoland.com/florida/quest-to-legoland/overview/

JEEP Ride with Filipe Toledo
- In collaboration with Lagardère Sport, we created a unique online game in WebGL as promotion for JEEP's participation in the World Surf League. It focused on an acid beach aesthetic and generated wavey hills to ride across.
https://www.facebook.com/JeepOlllllllOpeople/videos/1121805744535179/

LEGO Christmas - Road Trip
- In the frame of a Christmas wishlist campaign for LEGO we created an HTML5 game to get kids excited for the holiday season. You collected matching bricks on top of your car that turned into presents you put under your Christmas tree.

KAUFLAND Jumpers App & Microsite
- In collaboration with Brand Loyalty we created a microsite and Unity app to promote a new line of collectable in-store toys in connection to the European football cup.
https://apkpure.com/kaufland-jumpers/de.kaufland.jumpers

Tasks Included: Creative Direction, Project Management, Client Relations, Pitch Treatments, Quoting and Event Management.
───────────

profile_positions.title: Game Design

profile_positions.description:
Java Rhino created a Spaceship Cockpit Installation during their first year studies. It focused on the lonely tin-can experience of being in a spaceship and allowed the player the freedom to explore space by using a plethora of controls.

Tasks Included: Creative Direction, Design, Project Management and Voice Acting.
───────────
profile_positions.title: Producer

volunteer_experiences.description:
Less focused on 1 role, the tasks I've taken up have been varied and involved varied groups.
Facilitation of local group meetings and elections, planning out routes and visualising event plans and timelines, liaising with the police to maintain safety at events, giving basic legal and non-violent direct action trainings, performer, serving food and supporting arrestees, writing and reciting poems, and hitting the streets in protest.

Facilitated, sociocratically, the Media & Communications circle & meetings (4-10 members), running check-ins, updates, role elections & managing incoming internal requests as well as press requests. 

Frequently took an active role writing press releases, prepping messaging, serving as and arranging spokespersons for activities, arranging photographers and selecting photos, creating social media content, and producing and hosting DIY multi-cam livestreams at actions. 

Involved in 10+ actions & demonstrations including: Declaration of Rebellion, Utrecht Stroomt Over, Amersfoort Aan Zee (Kingsday), as well as actions at the ICC, Shell's headquarters & the Dutch Parliament.

On March 10th, 40.000 people marched for the climate in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. We demanded a safe future for ourselves and our children. The goal was to put pressure on the Dutch government to choose for real solutions for families, youth, small businesses and farmers. And to make the big polluters pay their fair share!

Tasks: Organised volunteers and communication platform, managed the website and instagram. Sourced, created and designed content for the campaign including maps for co-ordination, calls-to-action, inspirational content and social media posts.
───────────

BROEIKAS was a playful workspace and exhibition for independent games. Based in the back of a cozy cafe in Utrecht, a mix was created of approachable games for the general public and artistic game design.

Events I curated and helped organise were: Brunch Quest, voidscapes, Valentine's Night, & Playgrounds
───────────

Recorded interviews and conversations at JOIN, edited and released them via Soundcloud.
https://soundcloud.com/john-gottschalk/sets/atjoin2015
───────────

Along with bartending at ACU, I occasionally help source food for their free dinners hosted by the Barricade, and organising the political library.
───────────
